titleStmt.title: An epistle general to them who are of the royal priest-hood and chosen generation given forth from the movings of the power and spirit of truth, and now made publick to be sent abroad among the saints scattered in old and New England, Germany, Holland, Ireland, Scotland, Barbadoes, and Virginia, for them to read in the fear of the Lord.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

titleStmt.title: An epistle general to them who are of the royal priest-hood and chosen generation given forth from the movings of the power and spirit of truth, and now made publick to be sent abroad among the saints scattered in old and New England, Germany, Holland, Ireland, Scotland, Barbadoes, and Virginia, for them to read in the fear of the Lord.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Fox. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
